title: Banana bread
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons dried yeast, or 2 sachets easy-blend yeast', '60 g (2¼ oz) caster sugar or soft light brown sugar', '150 g (5½ oz) wholemeal flour', '150 g (5½ oz) strong white flour', '1½ teaspoons ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '4 ripe bananas', '1 whole egg plus 1 egg white, beaten together', 'Vegetable oil for greasing', 'To serve: fruit preserve or low-fat soft cheese, optional']
